item.title: 石油产量创历史新高，埃克森、雪佛龙第三季度利润超预期
item.description: 美国石油生产商埃克森美孚（Exxon Mobil）和雪佛龙（Chevron）周五公布的第三季度利润好于预期，表现优于欧洲竞争对手，原因是创纪录的高石油产量缓解了燃料利润率骤降带来的打击。【原文：U.S. oil producers Exxon Mobil and Chevron posted better-than-expected third-quarter profits on Friday, outperforming their European rivals, as record high oil production cushioned the blow from a plunge in fuel margins.】

item.title: 美国 10 月制造业降至 15 个月低点
item.description: 10 月份，美国制造业活动下滑至 15 个月以来的最低点，工厂面临着投入品价格上涨的问题。【原文：U.S. manufacturing activity slumped to a 15-month low in October and factories faced higher prices for inputs.】

item.title: 就业数据疲软，美联储被认为有望降息
item.description: 失业率保持不变表明劳动力市场依然强劲。【原文：An unchanged unemployment rate indicated that the labor market remains strong.】

item.title: 美国 10 月就业人数增长乏力受风暴和罢工影响
item.description: 受飓风和航空航天工厂工人罢工的影响，10月份美国就业增长大幅放缓，但失业率仍稳定在4.1%的水平，这为劳动力市场在周二大选前保持稳定提供了保证。【原文：U.S. job growth slowed sharply in October amid disruptions from hurricanes and strikes by aerospace factory workers, but the unemployment rate held steady at 4.1%, offering assurance that the labor market remained on solid footing ahead of Tuesday's election.】

item.title: 西蒙地产集团季度运营资金未达预期
item.description: 受综合购物中心租赁需求疲软的影响，商业地产投资信托公司西蒙地产集团（Simon Property Group）周五公布的第三季度运营资金（FFO）未能达到市场预期。【原文：Commercial real estate investment trust Simon Property Group missed market expectations for third-quarter funds from operations (FFO) on Friday, hurt by softer leasing demand at its mixed-use shopping centers.】

item.title: 美国 10 月份就业增长大幅放缓；失业率维持在 4.1%不变
item.description: 受飓风和航空航天工厂工人罢工的影响，10月份美国就业增长大幅放缓，但失业率仍稳定在4.1%的水平，这为劳动力市场在周二大选前保持稳定提供了保证。【原文：U.S. job growth slowed sharply in October amid disruptions from hurricanes and strikes by aerospace factory workers, but the unemployment rate held steady at 4.1%, offering assurance that the labor market remained on solid footing ahead of Tuesday's election.】

item.title: 成本下降、需求稳定，多米尼克能源公司第三季度利润超出预期
item.description: 周五，多米尼克能源公司（Dominion Energy）第三季度利润超出华尔街预期，原因是该电力公司受益于较低的成本和炎热天气期间稳定的电力需求。【原文：Dominion Energy beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter profit on Friday, as the electric utilities company benefited from lower costs and steady electricity demand during hot weather.】

item.title: T Rowe Price咨询费增加，季度利润飙升
item.description: 周五，资产管理公司 T Rowe Price 公布第三季度利润增长 17.4%，主要得益于美国股市走强推动了公司管理资产规模（AUM）的增长，咨询费也随之飙升。【原文：Asset manager T Rowe Price reported a 17.4% rise in third-quarter profit on Friday, helped by a jump in advisory fees as strength in U.S. equities boosted assets under management (AUM) at the firm.】

item.title: 汇丰银行、巴克莱银行和斯坦查特银行争夺美国银行业财富，不受白宫竞选影响
item.description: 随着美国企业为国际扩张计划寻求专业人才，英国大型全球性贷款机构汇丰银行、巴克莱银行和渣打银行正争相进入美国商业银行的蓬勃发展阶段。【原文：Britain's big global lenders HSBC , Barclays and Standard Chartered are vying to tap into a boom in U.S. commercial banking as corporate America seeks expertise for international expansion plans.】

item.title: 对冲活动强劲，Cboe 季度利润上升
item.description: Cboe Global Markets 周五公布，由于投资者积极对冲地缘政治和经济不确定性，期权交易强劲，第三季度利润上升。【原文：Cboe Global Markets reported a rise in third-quarter profit on Friday, driven by strong options trading as investors actively hedged against geopolitical and economic uncertainties.】

item.title: 波音公司提出新的工资方案以结束罢工，波音股价上涨
item.description: 周五收盘前，波音公司上涨了 2%，因为这家美国飞机制造商提高了对约 33,000 名罢工工人的加薪提议，这是该公司在此前两次合同提议遭到员工拒绝后，为结束破坏性罢工所做的最新努力。【原文：Boeing rose 2% before the bell on Friday after the U.S. planemaker bumped its wage hike offer to about 33,000 striking workers, its latest effort to end a damaging strike after two earlier contract offers were rebuffed by employees.】

item.title: 雅培在早产儿配方奶粉试验中首战告捷后股价上涨
item.description: 周五收盘前，雅培制药公司股价上涨近 5%，此前陪审团认定该公司和 Reckitt 旗下的一家公司在早产儿配方奶粉风险诉讼案中没有责任。【原文：Abbott Laboratories shares rose nearly 5% before the bell on Friday, after a jury cleared the company and a Reckitt unit of liability in a lawsuit over their premature baby formulas' risks.】

item.title: 石油需求稳定，管道运营商恩桥公司第三季度利润增长一倍多
item.description: 周五，Enbridge 公布其第三季度利润增长了两倍多，原因是这家加拿大管道运营商受益于稳定的石油需求。【原文：Enbridge posted a more than twofold jump in its third-quarter profit on Friday, as the Canadian pipeline operator benefited from steady oil demand.】

item.title: 埃克森86亿美元利润超预期，销量抵消价格疲软影响
item.description: 埃克森美孚周五公布的第三季度利润超过了华尔街的预期，这主要得益于其首个完整季度强劲的石油产量，其中包括美国页岩油生产商先锋自然资源公司（Pioneer Natural Resources）的石油产量。【原文：Exxon Mobil on Friday beat Wall Street's third quarter profit estimate, boosted by strong oil output in its first full quarter that includes volumes from U.S. shale producer Pioneer Natural Resources.】

item.title: 亚马逊安抚马匹，薪资即将公布
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 对冲基金在僵持不下的美国大选中寻找交易机会
item.description: 对冲基金和其他投资者正在寻找既能从共和党总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普获胜中获利，又能在副总统卡马拉-哈里斯获胜的情况下提供有限下跌空间的交易。【原文：Hedge funds and other investors are searching for trades that profit from a win by Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump, but also offer limited downside in the event of a victory by Vice President Kamala Harris.】

item.title: 国际需求强劲，加航上调核心利润预期
item.description: 加拿大航空公司周五上调了其年度核心利润预期，因为加拿大最大的航空公司受益于强劲的国际旅游需求。【原文：Air Canada raised its annual core profit forecast on Friday, as the country's largest carrier benefits from strong demand for international travel.】

item.title: 一年过去了，英特尔吹嘘的人工智能芯片交易却没有成功
item.description: 英特尔公司周四发布的乐观营收预期掩盖了这家饱受争议的公司的痛点：被吹捧为人工智能芯片的销售并未达到预期。【原文：Intel's upbeat revenue projections on Thursday masked a sore point for the embattled company: chips touted for artificial intelligence have not lived up to sales expectations.】

item.title: 就业数据公布前，亚马逊业绩提振期指上涨
item.description: 亚马逊乐观的财报抵消了上一交易日由科技股主导的大跌，受此提振，美国股指期货周五上涨，投资者在等待关键的非农就业数据，以寻找美联储利率轨迹的线索。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rose on Friday, buoyed after upbeat earnings from Amazon offset a tech-led selloff in the previous session, as investors awaited crucial nonfarm payrolls data for clues on the Federal Reserve's interest-rate trajectory.】

item.title: 贝恩计划在 11 月初提出富士软收购要约，等待公司批准
item.description: 私募股权公司贝恩资本周五表示，该公司计划在 11 月初而不是原计划的 10 月底启动对日本软件公司富士软的要约收购，但仍在等待公司批准。【原文：Bain Capital is planning to launch a tender offer for Japanese software firm Fuji Soft in early November rather than late October as originally planned but still awaits company approval, the private equity firm said on Friday.】

item.title: 出口疲软，日本再次下调本财年经济增长预期
item.description: 由于出口疲软拖累了脆弱的经济复苏，日本政府周五下调了本财年的国内生产总值（GDP）增长预期。【原文：Japan's government on Friday lowered its GDP growth forecast for the current fiscal year as weaker exports drag on a fragile economic recovery.】

item.title: 受制裁影响的中国科技产业对特朗普和哈里斯总统任期的影响感到困惑
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）下周赢得美国总统大选对中国科技企业前景的影响远大于卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）的获胜。【原文：Donald Trump winning the U.S. presidency next week would muddle the outlook for Chinese technology firms far more than a win for Kamala Harris, with executives saying his unpredictable style could lead as much to a reprieve for the sanction-hit industry as increased restrictions.】

item.title: 西门子高管告诉本报，Altair 交易后西门子将进行更多收购
item.description: 西门子董事会成员塞德里克-内克（Cedrik Neike）表示，在斥资 106 亿美元收购美国工业软件公司 Altair 之后，西门子已经具备了进一步收购软件公司的资金实力。【原文：Siemens has the financial muscle for further software acquisitions after its $10.6 billion purchase of U.S. industrial software company Altair , managing board member Cedrik Neike said.】

item.title: 苹果、亚马逊财报发布后法兰克福股市持稳
item.description: 周五，在法兰克福上市的 "华丽 7 股 "苹果和亚马逊股价基本持稳，两家公司均在周四盘后发布了季度财报，但成交量清淡。【原文：Frankfurt-listed shares of "Magnificent 7" stocks Apple and Amazon were broadly steady on Friday, in light volumes after both companies reported quarterly earnings after-market on Thursday.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚在禁止销售苹果 iPhone 16 几天后又禁止销售谷歌智能手机
item.description: 印度尼西亚表示，由于规定要求使用本地生产的零部件，该国已禁止销售 Alphabet 旗下谷歌公司生产的智能手机，几天前，科技巨头苹果公司的 iPhone 16 也因同样原因被禁止销售。【原文：Indonesia said it has banned sales of smartphones made by Alphabet's Google due to rules requiring the use of locally manufactured components, days after blocking sales of tech giant Apple's iPhone 16 for the same reason.】

item.title: 丑闻阴影笼罩下的野村当季利润增长一倍多
item.description: 周五，日本野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings）的季度利润增长了一倍多，实现了连续第六个季度的增长，这主要得益于其批发业务的强劲表现，尽管该银行一直受到交易丑闻的困扰。【原文：Japan's Nomura Holdings more than doubled its quarterly profit on Friday, marking its sixth straight quarter of growth, bolstered by a strong performance at its wholesale business, even as the bank was dogged by a trading scandal.】

item.title: 欧洲 值得铭记的十一月
item.description: Stella Qiu 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu】

item.title: 日本央行称，日本最低工资上涨可能推高通胀率
item.description: 日本央行周五表示，日本最低工资标准的提高很可能主要通过服务价格上涨来推高通胀。【原文：The Bank of Japan said on Friday the country's rising minimum wage is likely to push up inflation mainly through higher services prices.】

item.title: 日本三菱上半年净利润增长 33% 至 6180 亿日元
item.description: 受日元贬值和资产剥离的影响，日本贸易公司三菱周五公布，截至 9 月份的六个月净利润为 6180 亿日元（40 亿美元），同比增长 33%。【原文：Japanese trading house Mitsubishi on Friday posted net profit of 618 billion yen ($4 billion) for the six months to September, up 33% from a year earlier, driven by lower yen and divestments.】

item.title: 日本第三季度经济增长可能大幅降温，这是对日本央行政策的考验
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，受消费和资本支出疲软的影响，日本第三季度经济预计将大幅放缓，这可能会使央行进一步加息的计划复杂化。【原文：Japan's economy is expected to have slowed sharply in the third quarter hurt by sluggish consumption and capital spending, a Reuters poll showed, which could complicate the central bank's plans to hike rates further.】
